seo.title: Pricing - Web Development Subscriptions
seo.description: Explore our flexible web development subscription plans. Transparent pricing, no hidden costs. Choose the plan that fits your business needs.
seo.ogDescription: Find the perfect web development subscription plan for your business

data.title: Transparent Pricing
data.subtitle: Choose Your Plan
data.text: Get professional web development services with our flexible subscription plans. No hidden costs, cancel anytime.

plans.name: Basic
plans.description: Perfect for small businesses starting their online journey

plans.name: Professional
plans.description: Ideal for growing businesses needing more features

plans.name: Enterprise
plans.description: For established businesses requiring premium support

items.title: What's included in the monthly fee?
items.text: Your subscription includes ongoing maintenance, regular updates, hosting, security updates, and technical support based on your chosen plan.

items.title: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
items.text: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. The new rate will be prorated based on your billing cycle.

items.title: What payment methods do you accept?
items.text: We accept all major credit cards, bank transfers, and PayPal. Payments are processed securely through Stripe.

items.title: Is there a minimum contract period?
items.text: No, our subscriptions are month-to-month or year-to-year with no long-term commitment required. You can cancel anytime.

items.title: What happens if I need additional features?
items.text: We can customize any plan to include additional features. Contact us to discuss your specific requirements.

data.title: Still Have Questions?
data.subtitle: Get in touch
data.text: Contact us for a custom quote or to discuss your specific requirements.
